website_summaries.verdict: The Sony 10-18mm f/4 wide-angle zoom lens is a sharp optic that adds an ultra-wide perspective to your NEX photography system.

customer_reviews.title: Good lens!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great wide-angle lens and I'm glad that I can use it on my Sony A6500. However, I think that there is potential for improvement to make the perspective look even more natural when at 10 - 13 mm. Great lens though!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Great lens but...
customer_reviews.text: ... as with all ultra wide lenses you need to compose your shots carefully otherwise you end up with photos with verticals falling towards or away from the camera, os making use of your cameras gyroscope/level indicator is a good idea. The lens is fairly compact with good build quality and is sharp so I’m very happy with it as an addition to my Sony mirrorless kit.
customer_reviews.author: Johno

customer_reviews.title: Great little lens for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little super-wide lens for my Sony a6000. Light in weight but solid and well made. Excellent performance - especially when stopped down a couple of notches. Obviously some drop-off in sharpness at the edges at 10mm, but you would expect that and it is well within acceptable boundaries. I was surprised how little linear distortion there is for such a wide lens. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had read quite varied reviews about this lense, but really needed something wider than my 18-135. At 10-18mm this is great for landscapes and video work. I've not had it long, but it seems super-sharp for such an ultra-wide zoom and I'm looking forward to two things: landscapes/architectural shots and also seeing how creative I can be with such a wide lense in video mode.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Wray

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lens - notwithstanding the limitations of any zoom lens, this offers good brightness across the focal range, very reasonable size and acceptable sharpness. Maybe overpriced for what it is (but all Sony lenses seem to suffer from that!), but its flexibility, portability and range make it a brilliant tool - particularly for landscape photography. I have noticed some focussing issues in low light, but apart from that it is difficult to fault.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Dot Design

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome lens. nice and wide, light, responsive. perfect for vlogging on an a6300
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: A superb lens for my nex7 camera. Pricy but worth every penny and the best lens to get if you want to open up the capabilities of your nex.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Sony wide angle lens
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sony wide angle lens. It works beautifully with my Sony A6300 - a camera I am using for vlogging and more serious filmmaking. I've made a small review video that you may enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: Christian Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this lens for shoot architecture and astrophotography. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lens for shoot architecture and astrophotography. The lens is very unsharp at 10mm/f4 and it is never very sharp at f4. It is a decent lens when stopped down. There was a youtube video about this lens, and it indicated that there are two versions of the lens. White box version is unsharp and red box contain a sharper lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lens! Works well with my A7sii and Came ...
customer_reviews.text: Good lens! Works well with my A7sii and Came Optimus gimbal! In full frame mode, you will see the lens hood but I switched to AUTO which then removes the lens hood! Len autofocus is fantastic, never experienced any lag in autofocus speed!
customer_reviews.author: Kartik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens. Well made, substantial lens with great functionality. Completes my range
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Impressive image quality - I use it on my A6000. Light and compact, too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lens to add to your Nex Series
customer_reviews.text: It gives you the wide angle you needed for Nex series. It is sharp and clear, and light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this lens
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this lens . No better than the kit lens ,with a big price tag .sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packing and delivery were awful Descent lense
customer_reviews.text: Descent lense, a bit heavy. Packing and delivery were awful !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Forth

customer_reviews.title: great landscape lens - superb clarity
customer_reviews.text: For owners of the Sony 6000 series this is the perfect lens for landscapes, cityscapes, and anywhere where you would like a wide view. With a fixed F4 aperture it works well in low light, and image stabilisation helps a lot with handheld cityscapes at night. The autofocus is superb in low light too. We are very impressed with the image quality across the range, and although far from cheap this is a high quality lens and worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: markr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lens for video... super!
customer_reviews.text: I have put off buying this lens for so long because of it's very high price. I bought it recently and it is fabulous. Amazing for video on my Sony A6400. Get this lens and also the Sigma 16mm f/1.4 for your low light needs. The only two lenses that you need for your Sony for video. Get the Sigma 56mm f/1.4 for your portraits and you are sorted and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wide angle lens
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wide angle lens to use with Sony a6400. Stunning landscape shots. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great super wide lens for APSC and Full frame Sony Mirrorless cameras.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens. It’s super wide and is perfect for Landscapes, street photography and vlogging. Images are super crisp and the lens is a constant F4 across its zoom range. You can also pair with a Sony Mirrorless full frame, where is goes super wide, but below 12mm vinagretting is of issue. Yes it’s expensive, but it very versatile. It also has lens stabilisation. It weighs barely more than the 16-50 kit lens and has a compact design. Well worth adding to your lens collection.
customer_reviews.author: Marafunman

customer_reviews.title: ... my 10-18 at least 3 years and I still love it. Makes for some amazing photos and its ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had my 10-18 at least 3 years and I still love it. Makes for some amazing photos and its very usable for many situations, OF course don't put people at the edges etc, expect some bent buildings but some winners from it are outstanding. My fav lens for my A6000
customer_reviews.author: Mr B Gloucester

customer_reviews.title: E MOUNT HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: Great lens nice and sharp from corner to center. It doesn't get better than this in E mount
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Outperformed by the standard Sony 16-50mm lens
customer_reviews.text: Despite what other users here say I did not find this particular lens to be in any way spectacularly sharp at any aperture. Indeed I was so disappointed with it that I returned it within three days for refund. The best comparison I can give is that on my NEX 7 the standard 16-50mm Sony lens (which is not known to be a top class piece of glass) outperformed the 10-18 at 16mm by a country mile, Maybe I just got a bad sample of this lens but I certainly would not recommend it to other Sony users.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Video Lens - Terrible Photography Lens.
customer_reviews.text: Great Video Lens - Terrible Photography Lens. Sadly I need both. Massively Overpriced Piece of Glass. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: A NO GO.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a little more than a year ago. Now it's broken, the engineer at Sony central service states "2nd group lens failed, need replacement". There was no evidence of damage, means it was a manufacturing problem. They asked me 530 pounds to fix it. Are you guys insane? Once more, felt so discouraged by Sony customer support. Don't buy it unless you're rich and can support 799 each year apparently. Also, samyang is a much better / cheaper choice and the lenses are under warranty for 2 years. Sony has a lot to learn, lost another client.
customer_reviews.author: Dan252014

product_meta.title: Sony SEL1018 E Mount - APS-C 10-18 mm F4.0 Wide Angle Zoom Lens
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Lens10-18 mm F4 super wide-angle zoom lens. Super ED glass and optical steadyshot image stabilisation. Minimum 10 mm focal length,ultra wide-angle zoom lens. Angle of view (APS-C): 109 degree-76 degree
APS-C, E-mount. Optical steady shot image stabilisation within the lens ensures smooth, blur-free photos and videos when shooting handheld, steady shot image stabilisation. Remove dust and debris from the camera body. Use a brush to sweep dust and debris from the entire camera. Use a large brush for the outside of the camera and a small brush for delicate parts. Do not press the brush hard against the camera; sweep gently. Remove dust and debris from delicate parts using a blower. Take the front lens cap off, and remove the dust on the lens surface using the blower. If particularly dirty, wet a soft cloth or lens tissue with lens cleaner solution, and wipe in a circular motion from the center of the lens. Do not apply lens cleaner solution directly to the lens.Do not use any organic solvent such as thinner or benzine to clean the lens. Replace the front lens cap to prevent dust from attaching to the lens. Press the lens release button, and detach the lens. Be careful do not touch the sensor's surface. Use the blower while holding the camera facing slightly downward so that dust and debris easily fall off the sensor's surface. Reattach the lens. Take the lens off and on in a dust-free location. Dust and debris may easily enter the camera and lens in a dusty location. For an A-mount: When you attach the lens, confirm that the mirror has been completely pushed down. After you are finished cleaning, check that dust has been removed. Set the shooting mode to Aperture Priority (A), and the aperture value to F11. Take a picture of a white wall, white paper, or the sky. Make sure that no dust shows on the image.

BOX CONTAINS
Lens
feature_bullets: 10-18 mm F4 super wide-angle zoom lens. Super ED glass and optical steady shot image stabilisation. Minimum 10 mm focal length
Ultra wide-angle zoom lens. Angle of view (APS-C): 109 degree – 76 degree
APS-C, E-mount. Optical steadyshot image stabilisation within the lens ensures smooth, blur-free photos and videos when shooting handheld
